channel.title: Mod/admin ::yelling
channel.description: Ok, well i need help. Is it possable for me to add a crow by a mod/admin yell? if so how?

item.title: Mod/admin ::yelling
item.dc:creator: @xxckwxx xxckwxx
item.description:
@xxckwxx wrote:

[quote=“I need a username, post:4, topic:302052”]Lol, IF you have a 317, Just change it to:
if(command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && muted == false) {
String titles = “”;

if (donator != 1) {
sM(“You need to be a donator to use Yell”);
} else {

switch (playerRights) {
case 0:
titles = "[donator] ";
break;

case 1:
titles = "@cr1@ ";
break;

case 2:
titles = "@cr2@ ";
break;

case 3:
titles = "[owner]@cr2@ ";
break;
}
yell(titles + playerName + ": " + command.substring(5));
}
} (You can delete [owner] But i would want pplz to know that i was owner[/quote]

lol yeah… if only that worked…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 13, 2009, 08:37:55 pm[/size][hr]Anyone, do you have one that really works? and hints??

Read full topic

item.title: Mod/admin ::yelling
item.dc:creator: @I_need_a_username I need a username
item.description:
@I_need_a_username wrote:

Lol, IF you have a 317, Just change it to:
if(command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && muted == false) {
String titles = “”;

if (donator != 1) {
sM(“You need to be a donator to use Yell”);
} else {

switch (playerRights) {
case 0:
titles = "[donator] ";
break;

case 1:
titles = "@cr1@ ";
break;

case 2:
titles = "@cr2@ ";
break;

case 3:
titles = "[owner]@cr2@ ";
break;
}
yell(titles + playerName + ": " + command.substring(5));
}
} (You can delete [owner] But i would want pplz to know that i was owner

item.dc:creator: @xxckwxx xxckwxx
item.description:
@xxckwxx wrote:

thanks dude![br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 13, 2009, 04:22:41 am[/size][hr]wait, no. Thats what i have on my server so it looks like this “[ADMIN]Bob: hi” i want the crown. like “\±/bob: hi”. you get me?

item.title: Mod/admin ::yelling
item.dc:creator: @reverce reverce
item.description:
@reverce wrote:

[code]if(command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && muted == false) {
String titles = “”;

if (donator != 1) {
sM(“You need to be a donator to use Yell”);
} else {

switch (playerRights) {
case 0:
titles = "[DONATOR] ";
break;

case 1:
titles = "[MOD] ";
break;

case 2:
titles = "[ADMIN] ";
break;

case 3:
titles = "[OWNER] ";
break;
}
yell(titles + playerName + ": " + command.substring(5));
}
}[/code]
my server yell is for donaters only, u can change that by editing the code

Read full topic
